trans-unit.source: Add class 'use-ajax' to a link. The link will be loaded using an Ajax call. When using this method, the href of the link can contain '/nojs/' as part of the path. When the Ajax JavaScript processes the page, it will convert this to '/ajax/'. The server is then able to easily tell if this request was made through an actual Ajax request or in a degraded state, and respond appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 在链接中添加类'use-ajax'。该链接将使用Ajax调用加载。使用该方法时,链接的href可以包含'/nojs/'作为路径的一部分。当Ajax JavaScript处理页面时,它会将其转换为'/ajax/'。然后,服务器就能够很容易地判断出这个请求是通过实际的Ajax请求发出的,还是处于降级状态,并作出适当的响应。

trans-unit.source: Add class 'use-ajax-submit' to a submit button in a form. The form will then be submitted via Ajax to the path specified in the #action. Like the ajax-submit class on links, this path will have '/nojs/' replaced with '/ajax/' so that the submit handler can tell if the form was submitted in a degraded state or not.
trans-unit.target: 在表单中的提交按钮中添加类'use-ajax-submit'。这样表单就会通过Ajax提交到#action中指定的路径。就像链接中的ajax-submit类一样,这个路径将用'/ajax/'替换'/nojs/',这样提交处理程序就可以知道表单是否在退化状态下提交。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if a parameter is typed to one of the following special classes the system will pass those values as well.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, implementations of this hook, must forward $bubbleable_metadata to the chained tokens that they invoke. For example:
trans-unit.target: 此外,这个钩子的实现,必须将$bubbleable_metadata转发到它们调用的链式令牌。例如

trans-unit.source: Additionally, some processing data is placed in $form_state, and can be accessed by \Drupal\Core\Field\WidgetBaseInterface::getWidgetState() and \Drupal\Core\Field\WidgetBaseInterface::setWidgetState().
trans-unit.target: 此外，一些处理数据位于$ form_state中，并且可以通过\ Drupal \ Core \ Field \ WidgetBaseInterface :: getWidgetState（）和\ Drupal \ Core \ Field \ WidgetBaseInterface :: setWidgetState（）进行访问。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the default configuration directory for the extension being installed is searched to discover if it contains default configuration that is owned by other enabled extensions. So, the frontpage view will also be installed when the Node module is installed after Views.
trans-unit.target: 另外,会搜索正在安装的扩展的默认配置目录,以发现是否包含其他启用的扩展所拥有的默认配置。所以,在Views之后安装Node模块时,也会安装frontpage view。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, whether retrieving from cache or not, it is important to know all of the assets (CSS and JavaScript) required by the rendered HTML, and this must also bubble from child to parent. Therefore, \Drupal\Core\Render\BubbleableMetadata includes that data as well.
trans-unit.target: 此外，无论是否从缓存中检索，了解渲染的HTML所需的所有资产（CSS和JavaScript）都是很重要的，并且这也必须从子级到父级冒泡。因此，\ Drupal \ Core \ Render \ BubbleableMetadata也包含该数据。

trans-unit.source: After a form is submitted and processed, normally the user should be redirected to a new destination page. This function figures out what that destination should be, based on the $form_state and the 'destination' query string in the request URL, and redirects the user there.

trans-unit.source: After completing the collection, modules are allowed to alter it. Lastly, any derived and incomplete theme hook definitions that are hook suggestions for base hooks (e.g., 'block__node' for the base hook 'block') need to be determined based on the full registry and classified as 'base hook'.
trans-unit.target: 完成集合后,允许模块对其进行修改。最后,任何派生的和不完整的主题钩子定义,都是对基础钩子的钩子建议(比如基础钩子'block'的'block__node'),需要根据完整的注册表来确定,并归为'基础钩子'。

trans-unit.source: After executing the validator callbacks specified hook_file_validate() will also be called to allow other modules to report errors about the file.
trans-unit.target: 执行验证程序后，还将调用指定的hook_file_validate（）回调，以允许其他模块报告有关文件的错误。

trans-unit.source: After running this method, access $this->element to get the element for this query.
trans-unit.target: 运行此方法后，访问$ this-> element以获取此查询的元素。

trans-unit.source: After the default grants have been loaded, we allow modules to alter the grants array by reference. This hook allows for complex business logic to be applied when integrating multiple node access modules.
trans-unit.target: 在加载了默认的授予之后,我们允许模块通过引用来改变授予数组。这个钩子允许在集成多个节点访问模块时应用复杂的业务逻辑。

trans-unit.target: 在渲染之后，主题系统将接管工作。有关更多信息，请参见主题系统和渲染API主题。

trans-unit.source: Ajax form submissions are almost always multi-step workflows, so that is one common use-case during which form rebuilding occurs.

trans-unit.source: Ajax is the process of dynamically updating parts of a page's HTML based on data from the server. When a specified event takes place, a PHP callback is triggered, which performs server-side logic and may return updated markup or JavaScript commands to run. After the return, the browser runs the JavaScript or updates the markup on the fly, with no full page refresh necessary.
trans-unit.target: Ajax是根据服务器的数据动态更新页面的HTML部分的过程。当指定的事件发生时,会触发一个PHP回调,执行服务器端的逻辑,并可能返回更新的标记或JavaScript命令来运行。在返回后,浏览器运行JavaScript或飞速更新标记,无需全页面刷新。

trans-unit.source: All $form_state properties that are not reserved keys (see other properties marked as uncacheable) persist throughout a multistep form sequence. Form API provides this key for modules to communicate information across form-related functions during a single page request. It may be used to temporarily save data that does not need to or should not be cached during the whole form workflow; e.g., data that needs to be accessed during the current form build process only. There is no use-case for this functionality in Drupal core.
trans-unit.target: 所有不属于保留键的$form_state属性(参见其他标记为不可缓存的属性)在整个多步骤表单序列中持久存在。表单API为模块提供了这个键,以便在单页请求中跨表单相关函数进行信息交流。它可用于临时保存不需要或不应在整个表单工作流中缓存的数据;例如,仅在当前表单构建过程中需要访问的数据。在Drupal核心中,这个功能没有使用案例。

trans-unit.source: All AJAX commands passed to AjaxResponse objects should implement these methods.
trans-unit.target: 所有传递给AjaxResponse对象的AJAX命令都应该实现这些方法。

trans-unit.source: All Ajax commands that render HTML should implement these methods to be able to return attached assets to the calling AjaxResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 所有渲染HTML的Ajax命令都应该实现这些方法,以便能够向调用的AjaxResponse对象返回附加的资产。

trans-unit.source: All Database exceptions should implement this interface so that they can be caught collectively. Note that this applies only to Drupal-spawned exceptions. PDOException will not implement this interface and module developers should account for it separately.
trans-unit.target: 所有的数据库异常都应该实现这个接口,这样它们就可以被集体捕获。请注意,这只适用于Drupal衍生的异常,PDOException不会实现这个接口,模块开发者应该单独说明。PDOException不会实现这个接口,模块开发者应该单独考虑这个问题。

trans-unit.source: All additional metadata from {menu_tree}, which contains "materialized" metadata about a menu link tree, such as whether a link in the tree has visible children and the depth relative to the root.
trans-unit.target: 来自{menu_tree}的所有附加元数据,它包含了关于菜单链接树的 "物化 "元数据,例如树中的链接是否有可见的子链接以及相对于根链接的深度。

trans-unit.source: All available variables are mirrored in page.html.twig. Some may be blank but they are provided for consistency.
trans-unit.target: 所有可用变量均在page.html.twig中进行镜像。有些可能为空白，但出于一致性考虑而提供。

trans-unit.source: All cache implementations have to implement this interface. Drupal\Core\Cache\DatabaseBackend provides the default implementation, which can be consulted as an example.
trans-unit.target: 所有缓存实现都必须实现此接口。Drupal \ Core \ Cache \ DatabaseBackend提供了默认实现，可以作为示例进行参考。

trans-unit.source: All cacheability metadata exposed in this interface is bubbled to parent objects when they are cached: if a child object needs to be varied by certain cache contexts, invalidated by certain cache tags, expire after a certain maximum age, then so should any parent object.
trans-unit.target: 在这个接口中暴露的所有缓存性元数据在缓存时都会冒泡到父对象上:如果一个子对象需要被某些缓存上下文改变、被某些缓存标签失效、在某个最大年龄后过期,那么任何父对象也应该如此。

trans-unit.source: All code in Drupal that allows users to perform tasks or view content must check that the current user has the correct permission before allowing the action. In the standard case, access checking consists of answering the question "Does the current user have permission 'foo'?", and allowing or denying access based on the answer. Note that access checking should nearly always be done at the permission level, not by checking for a particular role or user ID, so that site administrators can set up user accounts and roles appropriately for their particular sites.
trans-unit.target: Drupal中所有允许用户执行任务或查看内容的代码都必须在允许操作之前检查当前用户是否拥有正确的权限。在标准情况下,访问检查包括回答 "当前用户是否拥有'foo'权限?",并根据答案允许或拒绝访问。需要注意的是,访问检查几乎都应该在权限级别上进行,而不是通过检查某个特定的角色或用户ID来完成,这样站点管理员就可以为他们特定的站点设置适当的用户账户和角色。

trans-unit.source: All conditions must be met for the state to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 必须满足所有条件才能适用于国家。

trans-unit.source: All databases attached to the current database. This is used to allow prefixes to be safely handled without locking the table
trans-unit.target: 连接到当前数据库的所有数据库。这用于允许在不锁定表的情况下安全地处理前缀。

trans-unit.source: All entries in this array will be applied from front to back, with the first query to union on the right of the original query, the second union to the right of the first, etc.
trans-unit.target: 该数组中的所有条目将从前到后应用,第一个查询到的联合在原查询的右边,第二个联合在第一个联合的右边,等等。

trans-unit.source: All form elements are designed to have sane defaults so any or all can be omitted. Both the date and time components are configurable so they can be output as HTML5 datetime elements or not, as desired.
trans-unit.target: 所有的表单元素都有合理的默认值,因此可以省略任何或全部元素。日期和时间组件都是可配置的,因此它们可以根据需要输出为HTML5日期时间元素或不输出。

trans-unit.source: All functions designed to filter input should use drupal_validate_utf8 to ensure they operate on valid UTF-8 strings to prevent bypass of the filter.
trans-unit.target: 所有用于过滤输入的函数都应该使用drupal_validate_utf8来确保它们在有效的UTF-8字符串上运行,以防止过滤器被绕过。

trans-unit.source: All functions requiring a static variable to persist or cache data within a single page request are encouraged to use this function unless it is absolutely certain that the static variable will not need to be reset during the page request. By centralizing static variable storage through this function, other functions can rely on a consistent API for resetting any other function's static variables.
trans-unit.target: 所有需要静态变量在单个页面请求中持久化或缓存数据的函数都被鼓励使用这个函数,除非绝对确定在页面请求中不需要重置静态变量。通过这个函数集中存储静态变量,其他函数可以依靠一致的API来重置任何其他函数的静态变量。

trans-unit.source: All mappings in $settings takes precedence over this, but this can be used to optimize cache storage for a Drupal installation without cache customizations in settings.php. For example, this can be used to map the 'bootstrap' bin to 'cache.backend.chainedfast', while allowing other bins to fall back to the global default of 'cache.backend.database'.
trans-unit.target: 所有在$settings中的映射都优先于此,但这可以用来优化Drupal安装的缓存存储,而不需要在settings.php中自定义缓存。例如,这可以用来将 "bootstrap "bin映射到 "cache.backend.chainedfast",同时允许其他bin回到全局默认的 "cache.backend.database"。

trans-unit.source: All menu link plugins use the same interface for their configuration or editing form, but the implementations may differ.
trans-unit.target: 所有菜单链接插件的配置或编辑形式都使用相同的接口,但实现方式可能有所不同。

trans-unit.source: All modules need to ensure that all of their caches are flushed when hook_cache_flush() is invoked; any previously known information must no longer exist. All following hook_rebuild() operations must be based on fresh and current system data. All modules must be able to rely on this contract.
trans-unit.target: 所有模块都需要确保在调用hook_cache_flush（）时刷新所有缓存。任何先前已知的信息都必须不再存在。接下来的所有hook_rebuild（）操作必须基于最新的和当前的系统数据。所有模块都必须能够依赖此合同。

trans-unit.source: All non-renderable elements are removed so that the template has full access to the structured data but can also simply iterate over all elements and render them (as in the default template).
trans-unit.target: 所有不可渲染的元素都被移除,这样模板就可以完全访问结构化数据,但也可以简单地迭代所有元素并渲染它们(如在默认模板中)。

trans-unit.source: All of the cached result data will be available in $view->result, as well, so all ids used in the query should be discoverable.
trans-unit.target: 所有缓存的结果数据也将在$ view-> result中可用，因此查询中使用的所有id都应该是可发现的。

trans-unit.source: All other core-provided exception handlers have negative priorities so most module-provided listeners will naturally take precedence over them.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他核心提供的异常处理程序都有负的优先级,所以大多数模块提供的监听器自然会优先于它们。

trans-unit.source: All parameters apart from 'type' are optional except that type 'numeric' columns must specify 'precision' and 'scale', and type 'varchar' must specify the 'length' parameter.
trans-unit.target: 除了'type'以外的所有参数都是可选的,但'numeric'类型的列必须指定'precision'和'scale',而'varchar'类型必须指定'length'参数。

trans-unit.source: All queries perform case-insensitive matching on the 'source' and 'alias' fields, so the aliases '/test-alias' and '/test-Alias' are considered to be the same, and will both refer to the same internal system path.
trans-unit.target: 所有查询都会对 "源 "和 "别名 "字段进行大小写不敏感的匹配,因此别名"/test-alias "和"/test-Alias "被认为是相同的,都会引用相同的内部系统路径。

trans-unit.source: All rendering must happen within a render context. Within a render context, all bubbleable metadata is bubbled and hence tracked. Outside of a render context, it would be lost. This could lead to missing assets, incorrect cache variations (and thus security issues), insufficient cache invalidations, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 所有的渲染必须在渲染上下文中进行。在渲染上下文中,所有可冒泡的元数据都会被冒泡,从而被跟踪。在渲染上下文之外,它将丢失。这可能会导致丢失资产、不正确的缓存变化(从而导致安全问题)、不充分的缓存无效等。

trans-unit.source: All scoring mechanisms are provided as options to site administrators, and may be tweaked based on individual sites or disabled altogether if they do not make sense. Individual scoring mechanisms, if enabled, are assigned a weight from 1 to 10. The weight represents the factor of magnification of the ranking mechanism, with higher-weighted ranking mechanisms having more influence. In order for the weight system to work, each scoring mechanism must return a value between 0 and 1 for every node. That value is then multiplied by the administrator-assigned weight for the ranking mechanism, and then the weighted scores from all ranking mechanisms are added, which brings about the same result as a weighted average.
trans-unit.target: 所有的评分机制都是作为选项提供给网站管理员的,可以根据各个网站的情况进行调整,如果不合理,则完全禁用。单个评分机制如果启用,则会被赋予1到10的权重。权重代表排名机制的放大系数,权重越高的排名机制影响力越大。为了使权重系统发挥作用,每个评分机制必须为每个节点返回一个介于0和1之间的值。然后将该值乘以管理员为排名机制分配的权重,再将所有排名机制的加权分数相加,带来的结果与加权平均数相同。

trans-unit.source: All state information that can influence the result of a get() should be included. Typically, this includes a key for each override added via addOverride(). This allows external code to maintain caches of configuration data in addition to or instead of caches maintained by the factory.
trans-unit.target: 所有能够影响get()结果的状态信息都应该被包含在内。通常,这包括通过addOverride()添加的每个覆盖的键。这允许外部代码在工厂维护的缓存之外或代替缓存维护配置数据的缓存。

trans-unit.source: All tables created when rendering a '#type' => 'table' have the option of having column headers that the user can click on to sort the table by that column.
trans-unit.target: 呈现'#type'=>'table'时创建的所有表都可以选择具有列标题，用户可以单击该列标题以按该列对表进行排序。

trans-unit.source: All theme hook definitions are essentially just collated and merged in the above order. However, various extension-specific default values and customizations are required; e.g., to record the effective file path for theme template. Therefore, this method first collects all extensions per type, and then dispatches the processing for each extension to processExtension().
trans-unit.target: 所有的主题钩子定义基本上只是按照上述顺序进行整理和合并。但是,需要对各种扩展特有的默认值和自定义;例如,记录主题模板的有效文件路径。因此,本方法首先收集每个类型的所有扩展,然后将每个扩展的处理调度到processExtension()。

trans-unit.source: All views templates can be overridden with a variety of names, using the view, the display ID of the view, the display type of the view, or some combination thereof.
trans-unit.target: 所有视图模板都可以用各种名称覆盖,使用视图、视图的显示ID、视图的显示类型或它们的一些组合。

trans-unit.source: Allow delivery of cached pages.
trans-unit.target: 允许交付缓存页面。

trans-unit.target: 允许模块对其他模块提供的字段格式化器进行添加设置。

trans-unit.source: Allow modules to add settings to field widgets provided by other modules.
trans-unit.target: 允许模块为其他模块提供的字段小部件添加设置。

trans-unit.source: Allow modules to alter in-place editor plugin metadata.
trans-unit.target: 允许模块改变原地编辑插件元数据。

trans-unit.target: 允许模块改变特定操作的后备候选人。

trans-unit.target: 允许模块改变语言回退候选者。

trans-unit.target: 允许模块改变提示插件定义。

trans-unit.target: 允许模块在渲染前更改旅游项目。

trans-unit.target: 允许模块为RDF映射定义命名空间。

trans-unit.target: 允许模块响应Views缓存无效。

trans-unit.target: 允许模块接管上层配置数据的配置变更操作。

trans-unit.target: 允许替换当前用户ID,这样我们就可以缓存这些查询。

trans-unit.target: 允许使用同一代码库的不同数据库服务器。

trans-unit.target: 允许主题改变特定主题的设置形式。

trans-unit.target: 允许PHP数组处理具有相同值的多个选择项。

trans-unit.source: Allows Twig templates to attach asset libraries using
trans-unit.target: 允许Twig模板使用以下方法附加资产库

trans-unit.source: Allows YAML files to define config schema types.
trans-unit.target: 允许YAML文件定义配置模式类型。

trans-unit.source: Allows adding data to a row before processing it.
trans-unit.target: 允许在处理行之前向行添加数据。

trans-unit.source: Allows administrators to attach custom fields to fieldable types.
trans-unit.target: 允许管理员将自定义字段附加到可字段类型。

trans-unit.source: Allows administrators to create custom menu links.
trans-unit.target: 允许管理员创建自定义菜单链接。

trans-unit.source: Allows administrators to customize the site's navigation menus.
trans-unit.target: 允许管理员自定义网站的导航菜单。

trans-unit.source: Allows all tags that can be used inside an HTML body, save for scripts and styles.
trans-unit.target: 允许在HTML正文中使用的所有标签,脚本和样式除外。

trans-unit.source: Allows an item to be repeatedly claimed until it is actually deleted (no notion of lease time or 'expire' date), to allow multipass operations.
trans-unit.target: 允许一个项目被重复申请,直到它被实际删除(没有租赁时间或 "过期 "日期的概念),以允许多通道操作。

trans-unit.source: Allows base fields to be overridden on the bundle level.
trans-unit.target: 允许基础字段在捆绑层被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Allows entities to be translated into different languages.
trans-unit.target: 允许将实体翻译成不同的语言。

trans-unit.source: Allows entity types to provide routes.
trans-unit.target: 允许实体类型提供途径。

trans-unit.source: Allows for storage of:
trans-unit.target: 允许存储的:

trans-unit.source: Allows formatters to load information for field values being displayed.
trans-unit.target: 允许格式化人员加载正在显示的字段值的信息。

trans-unit.source: Allows formatters to load information for field values being displayed. Overrides FormatterInterface::prepareView
trans-unit.target: 允许格式化程序加载有关正在显示的字段值的信息。覆盖FormatterInterface :: prepareView

trans-unit.source: Allows manipulation of the response object when performing a redirect.
trans-unit.target: 允许在执行重定向时对响应对象进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Allows migrations to create entities with pre-defined IDs by forcing the entity to be new before saving.
trans-unit.target: 允许迁移在保存前强制实体为新实体,从而创建具有预定义ID的实体。

trans-unit.source: Allows modules and themes to change libraries' definitions; mostly used to update a library to a newer version, while ensuring backward compatibility. In general, such manipulations should only be done to extend the library's functionality in a backward-compatible way, to avoid breaking other modules and themes that may be using the library.
trans-unit.target: 允许模块和主题改变库的定义;主要用于更新库到一个较新的版本,同时确保向后兼容。一般来说,这样的操作只能用于以向后兼容的方式扩展库的功能,以避免破坏可能使用该库的其他模块和主题。

trans-unit.source: Allows modules to alter the language-specific $overrides array by invoking hook_transliteration_overrides_alter().
trans-unit.target: 允许模块通过调用hook_transliteration_overrides_alter（）来更改特定于语言的$ overrides数组。

trans-unit.source: Allows modules to provide additional default template variables or manipulate existing. This hook is invoked from template_preprocess() after basic default template variables have been set up and before the next template preprocess function is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 允许模块提供其他默认模板变量或操纵现有变量。在设置了基本的默认模板变量之后，在调用下一个模板预处理功能之前，将从template_preprocess（）调用此钩子。

trans-unit.source: Allows site administrators to modify configuration.
trans-unit.target: 允许网站管理员修改配置。

trans-unit.source: Allows the configuration entity storage to massage storage values before creating an entity.
trans-unit.target: 允许配置实体存储在创建实体前按摩存储值。

trans-unit.source: Allows the configuration entity storage to massage storage values before updating an entity.
trans-unit.target: 允许配置实体存储在更新实体之前按摩存储值。

trans-unit.source: Allows the creation of custom blocks through the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 允许通过用户界面创建自定义块。

trans-unit.source: Allows the selection to alter the SelectQuery generated by EntityFieldQuery.
trans-unit.target: 允许选择改变EntityFieldQuery生成的SelectQuery。

trans-unit.source: Allows themes and/or theme engines to discover overridden theme functions.
trans-unit.target: 允许主题和/或主题引擎发现被覆盖的主题功能。

trans-unit.source: Allows themes and/or theme engines to easily discover overridden templates.
trans-unit.target: 允许主题和/或主题引擎很容易发现被覆盖的模板。

trans-unit.source: Allows to add cacheability metadata to an object for the current runtime.
trans-unit.target: 允许为当前运行时的对象添加缓存性元数据。

trans-unit.source: Allows to ban individual IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: 允许禁止单个IP地址。

trans-unit.source: Allows to cache data based on file modification dates.
trans-unit.target: 允许根据文件修改日期来缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: Allows to grant access to just the labels.
trans-unit.target: 允许只对标签进行访问。

trans-unit.source: Allows to preprocess, format, and postprocess a mail message before it is passed to the sending system. By default, all messages may contain HTML and are converted to plain-text by the Drupal\Core\Mail\Plugin\Mail\PhpMail implementation. For example, an alternative implementation could override the default implementation and also sanitize the HTML for usage in a MIME- encoded email, but still invoking the Drupal\Core\Mail\Plugin\Mail\PhpMail implementation to generate an alternate plain-text version for sending.
trans-unit.target: 允许在将邮件传递到发送系统之前对其进行预处理，格式化和后处理。默认情况下，所有消息都可能包含HTML，并由Drupal \ Core \ Mail \ Plugin \ Mail \ PhpMail实现转换为纯文本。例如，替代实现可以覆盖默认实现，还可以对HTML进行净化以供MIME编码的电子邮件使用，但是仍然调用Drupal \ Core \ Mail \ Plugin \ Mail \ PhpMail实现以生成替代纯文本版本，以用于发送。

trans-unit.source: Allows users to change the color scheme of themes.
trans-unit.target: 允许用户改变主题的配色方案。

trans-unit.source: Allows users to create and organize related content in an outline.
trans-unit.target: 允许用户在大纲中创建和组织相关内容。

trans-unit.source: Allows users to manage customizable lists of shortcut links.
trans-unit.target: 允许用户管理可定制的快捷链接列表。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to operate on multiple entities as they are being prepared for view. Only use this if attaching the data during the entity loading phase is not appropriate, for example when attaching other 'entity' style objects.
trans-unit.target: 允许您在多个实体准备查看时对它们进行操作。只有在实体加载阶段附加数据不合适的情况下,例如附加其他 "实体 "风格的对象时,才可以使用此功能。

trans-unit.target: 还增加了 "非空 "约束,因为许多数据库不可靠地支持空列上的唯一键。

trans-unit.source: Also ensures that the process of grouping items does not change their relative order. This requirement may result in multiple groups for the same type and browsers, if needed to accommodate other items in between.
trans-unit.target: 还确保对项目进行分组的过程不会改变其相对顺序。这一要求可能会导致同一类型和浏览器的多个组别,如果需要在两者之间容纳其他项目。

trans-unit.source: Also ensures that the process of grouping items does not change their relative order. This requirement may result in multiple groups for the same type, media, and browsers, if needed to accommodate other items in between.
trans-unit.target: 同时确保对项目进行分组的过程不会改变其相对顺序。如果需要在两者之间容纳其他项目,这一要求可能导致同一类型、媒体和浏览器的多个组。

trans-unit.source: Also invokes hook_css_alter(), to allow CSS assets to be altered.
trans-unit.target: 还调用hook_css_alter（），以允许更改CSS资产。

trans-unit.source: Also merges the bubbleable metadata resulting from the rendering of the contents of the placeholders. Hence $elements will be contain the entirety of bubbleable metadata.
trans-unit.target: 还合并了占位符内容渲染后产生的可冒泡元数据。因此,$elements将包含全部的可冒泡元数据。

trans-unit.source: Also note that this function isn't called for node listings (e.g., RSS feeds, the default home page at path 'node', a recent content block, etc.) See Node access rights for a full explanation.
trans-unit.target: 还要注意，节点列表未调用此功能（例如，RSS提要，路径“节点”上的默认主页，最近的内容块等）。有关完整说明，请参见节点访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Also validates strings as UTF-8. All processed strings are also automatically flagged as safe markup strings for rendering.
trans-unit.target: 还可以将字符串验证为UTF-8。所有处理过的字符串都会被自动标记为安全标记字符串进行渲染。

trans-unit.source: Also, the latest release from the same major version is looked for, even beta releases, to display to the user as the "Latest version" option. Additionally, the latest official release from any higher major versions that have been released is searched for to provide a set of "Also available" options.
trans-unit.target: 同时,寻找同一主要版本的最新版本,甚至是测试版,作为 "最新版本 "选项显示给用户。此外,还将搜索已发布的更高主要版本中的最新官方版本,以提供一组 "也可使用 "的选项。

trans-unit.target: 另外,如果可能的话,你应该使用依赖注入来获得这个对象,你需要的服务是entity.query,它的方法getQuery()或getAggregateQuery()将获得查询对象。

trans-unit.source: An array containing all the update functions that should be run for each module, including the provided starting update and all subsequent updates that are available. The keys of the array contain the module names, and each value is an ordered array of update functions, keyed by the update number.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组,包含每个模块应该运行的所有更新函数,包括提供的起始更新和所有可用的后续更新。数组的键包含模块名称,每个值都是按更新号排序的更新函数数组。

trans-unit.source: An array containing query parameters.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含查询参数的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array describing the status of the site regarding available updates. If there is no update data, only one record will be returned, indicating that the status of core can't be determined. If data is available, there will be two records: one for core, and another for all of contrib (assuming there are any contributed modules or themes enabled on the site). In addition to the fields expected by hook_requirements ('value', 'severity', and optionally 'description'), this array will contain a 'reason' attribute, which is an integer constant to indicate why the given status is being returned (UPDATE_NOT_SECURE, UPDATE_NOT_CURRENT, or UPDATE_UNKNOWN). This is used for generating the appropriate email notification messages during update_cron(), and might be useful for other modules that invoke update_requirements() to find out if the site is up to date or not.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，描述有关可用更新的站点状态。如果没有更新数据，则仅返回一条记录，表明无法确定核心的状态。如果有可用数据，将有两条记录：一个用于核心，另一个用于所有contrib（假设站点上启用了任何贡献的模块或主题）。除了hook_requirements期望的字段（“ value”，“ severity”和“ description”）外，此数组还将包含“ reason”属性，该属性是一个整数常量，用于指示为什么返回给定状态（UPDATE_NOT_SECURE，UPDATE_NOT_CURRENT或UPDATE_UNKNOWN）。这用于在update_cron期间生成适当的电子邮件通知消息（），并可能对其他调用update_requirements（）的模块很有用，以找出该网站是否最新。

trans-unit.source: An array holding flood events, keyed by event name and identifier.
trans-unit.target: 一个存放洪水事件的数组,以事件名称和标识符为键。

trans-unit.source: An array keyed by entity type. Each value is an array whose keys are field names and whose value is an array with two entries:

trans-unit.source: An array keyed by field type. Each value is an array whose key are entity types including arrays in the same form that $fieldMap.

trans-unit.source: An array of "sections" within which user input must be valid. If the element is within one of these sections, the error must be recorded. Otherwise, it can be suppressed. self::$limit_validation_errors can be an empty array, in which case all errors are suppressed. For example, a "Previous" button might want its submit action to be triggered even if none of the submitted values are valid.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入必须有效的 "部分 "数组。如果元素在其中一个区域内,则必须记录错误。self::$limit_validation_errors可以是一个空数组,在这种情况下,所有的错误都会被抑制。例如,"Previous "按钮可能希望它的提交操作被触发,即使提交的值都不有效。
